tables.name: airline_id_to_name
tables.description: A table mapping airline IDs to their respective airline names.

columns.name: airline_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each airline.

columns.name: airline_name
columns.description: The name of the airline corresponding to the given airline ID.

tables.name: flight_bookings
tables.description: A table containing detailed records of flight bookings including travel details, passenger information, flight status, and amenities.

columns.name: airline_id
columns.description: Identifier for different airlines.

columns.name: flight_number
columns.description: Unique identification number for each flight.

columns.name: departure_date
columns.description: Date and time when the flight is scheduled to depart.

columns.name: arrival_date
columns.description: Date and time when the flight is scheduled to arrive.

columns.name: departure_time
columns.description: The scheduled time for the flight's departure.

columns.name: arrival_time
columns.description: The scheduled time for the flight's arrival.

columns.name: booking_code
columns.description: Unique code representing a particular booking.

columns.name: passenger_name
columns.description: Name of the passenger traveling on the flight.

columns.name: seat_number
columns.description: Assigned seat number for the passenger on the flight.

columns.name: cabin_class
columns.description: Class in which the passenger is traveling, such as Economy, Business, or First.

columns.name: fare
columns.description: The price paid for the flight ticket.

columns.name: extras
columns.description: Additional services or items purchased in connection with the flight.

columns.name: loyalty_points
columns.description: Points earned from the airline loyalty program for the flight.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the flight booking, such as Confirmed, Cancelled, or Pending.

columns.name: gate
columns.description: Gate at which the flight is scheduled to board.

columns.name: terminal
columns.description: Terminal from which the flight is scheduled to depart.

columns.name: baggage_claim
columns.description: Location where passengers can retrieve their checked baggage after the flight.

columns.name: duration_hours
columns.description: The flight's total duration in hours.

columns.name: layover_count
columns.description: Number of layovers during the flight.

columns.name: layover_locations
columns.description: Locations where the flight has layovers.

columns.name: aircraft_type
columns.description: Type of aircraft used for the flight.

columns.name: pilot
columns.description: Name of the pilot flying the aircraft.

columns.name: cabin_crew
columns.description: Names of the cabin crew members on the flight.

columns.name: inflight_entertainment
columns.description: Indicates whether in-flight entertainment is available or not.

columns.name: meal_option
columns.description: Meal preference selected by the passenger for the flight.

columns.name: wifi
columns.description: Availability of WiFi on the flight.

columns.name: window_seat
columns.description: Indicates if the passenger's seat is by the window.

columns.name: aisle_seat
columns.description: Indicates if the passenger's seat is by the aisle.

columns.name: emergency_exit_row
columns.description: Indicates if the passenger's seat is in an emergency exit row.

columns.name: number_of_stops
columns.description: Number of stops the flight makes before reaching the destination.

columns.name: loyalty_program_member
columns.description: Indicates whether the passenger is a member of the airline's loyalty program.
